imdb.title: Yuri Kuma Arashi
imdb.plot: In a world of war between bears and humans, a young schoolgirl is sent into an adventure quest to find the origin of this conflict.

episodes.title: Never Back Down on Love
episodes.plot: Kureha Tsubaki is a happy high school student in requited love until one day, bears suddenly start terrorizing the school, two mysterious transfer students appear, tragedy strikes, and things get... well, weird.

episodes.title: I Will Never Forgive You
episodes.plot: Kureha's not interested in going back to school, but not everyone is taking no for an answer. Will she come willingly, or will it take a home invasion, gunfire, and a direct challenge from the Wall?

episodes.title: Invisible Storm
episodes.plot: Kureha's classmates hold a terrible ceremony.

episodes.title: I Can't Get a Kiss
episodes.plot: The Severance Court has the day off, so Life Sexy takes the opportunity to relate a fairy tale - about a young princess named Lulu, who gave up on kisses.

episodes.title: I Want to Have You All to Myself
episodes.plot: Kureha's class apologizes for the Invisible Storm and offers to make it up to her. Meanwhile, we learn a little more about Ginko's past.

episodes.title: The Moon Girl and the Forest Girl
episodes.plot: Once upon a time, the worlds were divided in two by the sky.

episodes.title: The Girl That I Forgot
episodes.plot: As Ginko struggles to recover, Kureha realizes that she's forgotten a very dear friend for a very long time.

episodes.title: Bride-in-the-Box
episodes.plot: What was in that mysterious note to "The Criminal-Bear"? How did Yuriika and Reia meet all those years ago? And what really happened to Reia the day she died?

episodes.title: The Future of the Girls
episodes.plot: Ginko sees desire's true face, and Kureha longs to see Ginko's true face.

episodes.title: The Door to Friendship
episodes.plot: Now that Kureha knows the future her mother envisioned for her, she has to make some tough choices about what friendship means.

episodes.title: What We Hope For
episodes.plot: Chouko and her classmates have come up with a plan to eliminate their bear problem, but it involves a little sacrifice.

episodes.title: Yuri Kuma Arashi
episodes.plot: When yuri meets bear, a storm begins.
